pv37:17.3: vaggu ca susaṅgato ca → vaggu sumukho susaṅgato (bj); vaggū ca susaṅgato ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
pv37:32.1: ca sirīsavanā → ime sirisūpavanā ca (bj); ime sirisapavanā (sya1ed, sya2ed); ime pi sirīsavanā ca (pts-vp-pli2, mr)
pv37:49.2: purakkhatvā → purakkhipitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli2); purakkhitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
